textprocessor

Class TextProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • textprocessor.TextProcessor

  • public class TextProcessor
extends Object
    A class that provides functionality for reading, writing and parsing an epub file.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TextProcessor()
      Instantiates a new text processor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Text parse(String str)
      Parse a text string into a Text object, which has a tree structure and contains text elements like sentences, words and punctuation marks.
      void processBook(String pathIn, String pathOut)
      Process the book: extract its paragraphs from all chapters, parse them into Text objects, perform the words swapping operation, replace the initial paragraphs with the resulted text and write the processed book back into a file.
      void readBook(String path)
      Load the epub book form a path
      void writeBook(String path)
      Write the book into a file

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextProcessor

        public TextProcessor()
        Instantiates a new text processor.

    • Method Detail

      • readBook

        public void readBook(String path)
        Load the epub book form a path
        Parameters:
        path - a path to the epub file

      • writeBook

        public void writeBook(String path)
        Write the book into a file
        Parameters:
        path - path to the output file

      • processBook

        public void processBook(String pathIn,
                        String pathOut)
        Process the book: extract its paragraphs from all chapters, parse them into Text objects, perform the words swapping operation, replace the initial paragraphs with the resulted text and write the processed book back into a file.
        Parameters:
        pathIn - path to the input epub file.
        pathOut - path to the output epub file.

      • parse

        public Text parse(String str)
        Parse a text string into a Text object, which has a tree structure and contains text elements like sentences, words and punctuation marks.
        Parameters:
        str - a string to be parsed.
        Returns:
        the Text object.
